info.title: Location Sync Plugin
info.description: The LocationSync plugin provides geo-location functionality.

interval.description: Maximum time duration between each request to the Location Server (default: 10).

retries.description: Maximum number of request reties to the Location Server (default:20).

timezone.description: with this the timezone can be overridden, otherwise taken from location (note can als be overriden with JSONRPC call).
